channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16569] Removed unnecessary declarations of throwing InterruptedException in RpcServer
item.description:
To begin with, scattering such declarations are misleading.
The patch will require breaking compatibility at minor release.
item.summary: Removed unnecessary declarations of throwing InterruptedException in RpcServer

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
